name: Cirno Goes Skiing
description:
It's time to hit the slopes with Cirno and friends!

Although, Cirno might face bigger problems than the math problems she has tried to solve before. . .

Ski down the slopes! Do amazing tricks! Fight against unique bosses! Amass a great high score! All this in this amazing winter themed Touhou fangame.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Z, X, C  to do tricks while in the air

Try to jump at a ramp to get epic air time and spin to the win!

Made for Touhou Game Jam 10 in 72 hours.
